short_summary: Request for Information for Boundary Road Swing Bridge replacement project
description: The Parks Canada Agency is launching a Request for Information (RFI) process to support the planning and implementation of its ongoing Boundary Road Swing Bridge replacement project.
full_summary:
## Boundary Road Swing Bridge Replacement Project: Request for Information

### Notice Type
This is a Request for Information (RFI) opportunity designed to solicit feedback and comments from industry stakeholders regarding the planning and implementation of the Boundary Road Swing Bridge replacement project.

### Procurement Overview
Parks Canada Agency is seeking input from contractors and construction managers who are interested in bidding on the project. The RFI process aims to gather information and feedback from industry stakeholders to support the planning and implementation of the project.

### Key Dates
* Tender closing date: April 13, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Amendment date: March 23, 2023

### Submission Requirements
Bidders are required to submit their responses electronically via email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca). Please note that emails containing links to bid documents will not be accepted. Bid documents must be sent as email attachments.

### Important Instructions
This is not a bid solicitation, and responses to this RFI will not result in the award of any contract. Nevertheless, Parks Canada will consider all responses received during this RFI process.

### Request for Information (RFI)
The RFI package, available at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca), includes detailed information about the project, including:

* Project description
* Bidder instructions
* Contract terms and conditions
* Evaluation criteria

To respond to the RFI, please submit your comments and feedback via email to [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca) by the closing date of April 13, 2023, at 14:00:00.

### Contact Information
For any questions or concerns regarding this RFI, please contact:

Sheldon Lalonde | Talent Acquisition Manager
Parks Canada Agency
National Capital Region,
819-355-8508 | [sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca](mailto:sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca)
